name: Kangaskhan
flavorText:
The infant rarely
ventures out of
its mother's protective pouch
until it is 3
years old.

previous.name: Tangela
previous.flavorText:
The whole body is
swathed with wide
vines that are similar to sea­
weed. Its vines
shake as it walks.

next.name: Horsea
next.flavorText:
Known to shoot
down flying bugs
with precision blasts of ink
from the surface
of the water.
